languages.text: "Не обижайся, Касс, но это все твои навигаторские штучки. У меня с утра премерзкое настроение было, но стоило Лорд-капитану взглянуть на тебя — как улыбка сама натянулась до ушей".
"No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."
languages.original_text: "Не обижайся, Касс, но это все твои навигаторские штучки. У меня с утра премерзкое настроение было, но стоило Лорд-капитану взглянуть на тебя — как улыбка сама натянулась до ушей".

traits.locale_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."

traits.locale_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."

traits.locale_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: “无意冒犯，小卡，但这应该是你的导航者能力在作祟。我今早本来一肚子起床气，但舰长大人看了你一眼之后，我突然感觉心里乐开了花。”
languages.original_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."

traits.locale_text: “无意冒犯，小卡，但这应该是你的导航者能力在作祟。我今早本来一肚子起床气，但舰长大人看了你一眼之后，我突然感觉心里乐开了花。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Ne le prenez pas mal, Cass, mais c'est à cause de votre truc de navigatrice. Je me suis levée du pied gauche ce matin, et pourtant, dès que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a posé les yeux sur vous, je me suis retrouvée à sourire comme une gamine. »
languages.original_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."

traits.locale_text: « Ne le prenez pas mal, Cass, mais c'est à cause de votre truc de navigatrice. Je me suis levée du pied gauche ce matin, et pourtant, dès que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} a posé les yeux sur vous, je me suis retrouvée à sourire comme une gamine. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «No te ofendas, Cass, pero estas son tus cosas de Navegante. Me desperté con un humor terrible esta mañana, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán te lanzó una mirada y de repente me puse a sonreír de oreja a oreja».
languages.original_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."

traits.locale_text: «No te ofendas, Cass, pero estas son tus cosas de Navegante. Me desperté con un humor terrible esta mañana, pero {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán te lanzó una mirada y de repente me puse a sonreír de oreja a oreja».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「悪気はないんだ、カシア。でも、航宙士のことよ。今朝は不機嫌な気分で目覚めたんだけど、ロード・キャプテンがあなたをひと目見ただけで、急に大きな笑みがこぼれたわ」
languages.original_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."

traits.locale_text: 「悪気はないんだ、カシア。でも、航宙士のことよ。今朝は不機嫌な気分で目覚めたんだけど、ロード・キャプテンがあなたをひと目見ただけで、急に大きな笑みがこぼれたわ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Nehmt es mir nicht übel, Cass, doch es ist Euer ganzer Navigatoren-Kram. Ich bin heute mit einer üblen Laune aufgewacht, aber der Lord Captain hat Euch nur ein einziges Mal angesehen und plötzlich musste ich vom einen Ohr zum anderen grinsen."
languages.original_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."

traits.locale_text: "Nehmt es mir nicht übel, Cass, doch es ist Euer ganzer Navigatoren-Kram. Ich bin heute mit einer üblen Laune aufgewacht, aber der Lord Captain hat Euch nur ein einziges Mal angesehen und plötzlich musste ich vom einen Ohr zum anderen grinsen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."

languages.text: "Cass, yanlış anlama da bunlar hep Rotacılıktan. Bu sabah çok huzursuz uyanmıştım. Sonra Lord Kaptan sana bir bakış attı, yüzümde güller açtı."
languages.original_text: "No offence, Cass, but it's all your Navigator business. I woke up in a foul mood this morning, but the Lord Captain took one look at you and I suddenly had a smile stretching from ear to ear."
